xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content: ## Homepage Tour (by steps order) main.homepageTour.welcome.title=Welcome to XWiki main.homepageTour.welcome.content=In the next couple of minutes you will discover your wiki's interface and basic functionalities. main.homepageTour.panels.title=Panels main.homepageTour.panels.contentA=The current panels allow you to access your wiki's applications and pages. main.homepageTour.panels.contentB=Administrators can customise them and decide which panels are shown. main.homepageTour.breadcrumbs.title=Breadcrumbs main.homepageTour.breadcrumbs.contentA=The breadcrumbs allow you to identify where your page is located and navigate the hierarchy. main.homepageTour.breadcrumbs.contentB=The {0} button will always take you to the wiki's home page. main.homepageTour.pageContent.title=Page Content main.homepageTour.pageContent.contentA=This is the place where the content of the current page is displayed. main.homepageTour.pageContent.contentB=Edit this page to add tables, lists, macros and structure in order to organize your knowledge. main.homepageTour.pageMenu.title=Page Menu main.homepageTour.pageMenu.contentA=This menu contains page related actions. With the appropriate rights, you can edit, create, administer or delete pages. main.homepageTour.pageMenu.contentB=The {0} button reveals more actions like: Export, Print, Share, etc. main.homepageTour.pageTabs.title=Page Tabs main.homepageTour.pageTabs.contentA=Comments are a great way for users to discuss the page content. main.homepageTour.pageTabs.contentB=You can also attach files, compare page versions or see page information. main.homepageTour.header.title=Header main.homepageTour.header.contentA=You can Search for content, Watch for page changes or access your User Profile. main.homepageTour.header.contentB=The {0} button, opens a Drawer which contains wiki related actions, like Administration and Indexes. main.homepageTour.tourComplete.title=Tour Complete main.homepageTour.tourComplete.contentA=This completes your tour on XWiki's interface and basic functionalities. main.homepageTour.tourComplete.contentB=For more details on each feature, access the {0}documentation{1}.
